text: Lise Nørgaard (born Elise Jensen; 14 June 1917 – 1 January 2023) was a Danish journalist, author and screenwriter. She is known for her book Kun en pige (Only a girl) and for writing the screenplay of the television series Matador. She was born in Roskilde. Nørgaard turned 100 in 2017. She died on 1 January 2023 in Copenhagen, at the age of 105. ==Books that she wrote== * Med mor bag rattet, (Gyldendal 1959). * Volmer - portræt af en samfundsstøtte, (Gyldendal 1970). * Julen er hjerternes fest, Short stories, (Gyldendal 1978). * Stjernevej, (Gyldendal 1981). * Mig og farmor, Noveller, (Husets publishing, 1984). * Sorte syvlinger, (Spectator 1961). * Jo mere vi er sammen, (Rhodos 1966). * En hund i huset, (Lindhardt og Ringhof 1980). * Jeg gik mig over sø og land, essays, (Fisker 1988). * Historien om Matador, (Danmarks Radio 1984). * Syv små hunde og deres skæbne, (Fisker 1991). * Kun en pige, memoirs, part 1, (Gyldendal 1992). * De sendte en dame, memoirs part 2, (Gyldendal 1997). ==More reading== Connie Hedegaard, Niels Jorgen-Kaiser, Nils Berger Wamberg, Så er det Sagt! -- en samtaleportræt af Lise Nørgaard (English: So it is said!: A conversational portrait of Lise Nørgaard), Gyldendal, 1997, 157pp ==Related pages== *List of Danish writers ==References== ==Other websites== * * Litteratursiden.dk - Lise Nørgaard * Category:1917 births Category:2023 deaths Category:Danish journalists Category:Danish screenwriters Category:Centenarians
